OutcomeDescriptionAndRubrics.description: An ability to apply knowledge of mathematics, science, and engineering.
An ability to design and conduct experiments, as well as to analyze and interpret data.

An ability to design a system, component, or process to meet desired needs within realistic constraints such as economic, environmental, social, political, ethical, health and safety, manufacturability, and sustainability.
rubrics: Develop design requirements from the problem statement that meet desired needs
Identify relevant, realistic design constraints from the design requirements
Produce a design that satisfies design requirements within relevant, realistic constraints

OutcomeDescriptionAndRubrics.description: An ability to function on multidisciplinary teams.
An ability to identify, formulate, and solve engineering problems.
Understanding of professional and ethical responsibility.
rubrics: Knowledge of the code of ethics in the discipline
Recognize the ethical dimension of an issue in the discipline

OutcomeDescriptionAndRubrics.description: Ability to communicate effectively
The broad education necessary to understand the impact of engineering solutions in a global, economic, environmental and societal context.
Recognition of the need for, and an ability to engage in life-long learning.
A knowledge of contemporary issues.
rubrics: Current technological events in the discipline
Awareness of emerging technologies in the discipline

OutcomeDescriptionAndRubrics.description: An ability to apply knowledge of computing and mathematics appropriate to the discipline.
An ability to analyze a problem, and identify and define the computing requirements appropriate to its solution.
rubrics: Demonstrates an ability to analyze a problem, and identify and define the computing requirements appropriate to its solution

OutcomeDescriptionAndRubrics.description: An ability to design, implement, and evaluate a computer-based system, process, component, or program to meet desired needs.
rubrics: Develop design requirements from the problem statement that meet desired needs
Identify relevant, realistic design constraints from the design requirements
Produce a design that satisfies design requirements within relevant, realistic constraints

OutcomeDescriptionAndRubrics.description: An ability to function effectively on teams to accomplish a common goal.
rubrics: Quality of contribution to the team effort

OutcomeDescriptionAndRubrics.description: An understanding of professional, ethical, legal, security and social issues and responsibilities
rubrics: Knowledge of the code of ethics in the discipline
Recognize the ethical dimension of an issue in the discipline

OutcomeDescriptionAndRubrics.description: An ability to communicate effectively with a range of audiences.
An ability to analyze the local and global impact of computing on individuals, organizations, and society.
rubrics: Demonstrates an ability to analyze the local impact of computing on individuals, organizations, and society.
Demonstrates an ability to analyze the global impact of computing on individuals, organizations, and society.

OutcomeDescriptionAndRubrics.description: Recognition of the need for and an ability to engage in continuing professional development.
An ability to use current techniques, skills, and tools necessary for computing practice.
rubrics: Demonstrates an appropriate skill level using a given technique for computing practice
Demonstrates an appropriate skill level using a given modern (current) tool for computing practice

OutcomeDescriptionAndRubrics.description: An ability to apply mathematical foundations, algorithmic principles, and computer science theory in the modeling and design of computer-based systems in a way that demonstrates comprehension of the tradeoffs involved in design choices.
rubrics: Demonstrates an ability to apply mathematical foundations to computer-based systems in a way that demonstrates tradeoffs in design choices
Demonstrates an ability to apply algorithmic principles and computer science theory to computer-based systems in a way that demonstrates tradeoffs in design choices

OutcomeDescriptionAndRubrics.description: Able to apply design and development principles in the construction of software of varying complexity
rubrics: Demonstrates an ability to apply design and development principles in the construction of software of varying complexity
